mapper.select: SELECT s.num , s.userNum , s.prodTitle , s.prodContents , s.fileName , s.regdate , s.prodType , s.price , s.prodRate , s.prodState FROM syh_shopping s JOIN syh_user u ON s.userNum = u.num WHERE s.prodState = 'y' ORDER BY s.num DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO syh_shopping (userNum, prodTitle, prodContents, fileName, price) VALUES (#{userNum}, #{prodTitle}, #{prodContents}, #{fileName}, #{price})
